!echo "torchio==0.18.56" > requirements.txt
!pip download --requirement requirements.txt

# then after using "Add data" to selection the output of this notebook, pip install TorchIO in a new kernel with the following line:
# !pip install --quiet --no-index --find-links ../input/pip-download-torchio/ --requirement ../input/pip-download-torchio/requirements.txt
source.a69d0ed7: Use the output of this notebook to enable pip to install TorchIO offline with the command below. The output of this kernel is is useful because the kernel that creates your submission.csv file must be have the Internet turned off, and when the internet is off you can not pip install TorchIO in the usual way.
